contact.title: Need more help?
contact.description: If you cannot find the answer in the FAQ, please contact support.

GlobX.metaDescription: Quickly resolve questions while using GlobX.

header.title: How can we help you?
header.subtitle: Search for questions or browse categories regarding GlobX.

qna.program_q1: How do I install the GlobX bot?
qna.program_a1: Download the installation file for your OS from the 'Download' menu at the top of the homepage and run it.
qna.program_q2: I get a security warning when running the program.
qna.program_a2: Windows Defender may falsely identify it. Click 'More Info' -> 'Run Anyway' to launch GlobX normally.
qna.program_q3: Can I use it on a Mac?
qna.program_a3: Currently, only the Windows version is supported. Mac support is coming soon.
qna.program_q4: How do I update the program?
qna.program_a4: The GlobX bot automatically checks for the latest version and updates upon launch.
qna.account_a1: You can reset it via email verification using the 'Forgot Password' link at the bottom of the login screen.
qna.account_q2: How do I delete my account?
qna.account_a2: You can request account deletion in My Page > Account Management.
qna.trading_q1: What is the minimum operating capital?
qna.trading_a1: We recommend a minimum of 500 USDT for smooth operation of the GlobX bot.
qna.trading_a2: Currently, major global exchanges such as Binance, Bybit, and OKX are supported.
qna.trading_a3: All investment responsibility lies with the user, and past performance does not guarantee future results.
qna.trading_a4: Please check your internet connection. If the problem persists, contact support with the log file.
qna.funds_a1: Transfer cryptocurrency to the wallet address of the linked exchange, and the bot will automatically recognize the balance.
qna.funds_a2: GlobX does not charge separate withdrawal fees; only the exchange's network fees apply.
qna.funds_a3: Please ensure that your API key permissions include 'Read' access.
qna.data_a1: GlobX does not store API keys on the server; they are encrypted and stored locally for safety.

Quanty.metaDescription: User guide and FAQ for Quanty AI investment service.

header.title: Quanty Help Center
header.subtitle: Ask anything about data-driven AI investment, Quanty.

qna.program_q1: How do I apply the Quanty AI model?
qna.program_a1: Select your desired AI strategy (Trend/Counter-trend) on the dashboard and click 'Apply' to reflect it immediately.
qna.program_a2: Please clear your browser cache or try a hard refresh (Ctrl+F5).
qna.program_a3: Currently, Quanty supports a responsive web interface, and a dedicated app is under development.
qna.program_a4: You can toggle trade execution and major market alerts in the Settings > Notifications menu.
qna.account_q1: I want to unlock my account.
qna.account_a1: For security, accounts are locked after 5 failed login attempts. Contact support for identity verification to unlock it.
qna.account_a2: You can register Google OTP in the Security Settings menu to protect your account.
qna.trading_a1: Quanty AI only trades when a clear entry signal occurs. Wait times may vary depending on market conditions.
qna.trading_q2: Can I trust the backtesting results?
qna.trading_a2: Results are conservatively calculated based on the past 5 years of tick data, including slippage.
qna.trading_a3: Yes, you can manually specify the maximum leverage multiplier on the strategy settings page.
qna.trading_a4: Yes, Quanty AI basically includes stop-loss logic according to the strategy, and manual forced liquidation is also possible.
qna.funds_q1: I want to increase my investment amount.
qna.funds_a1: If you deposit additional funds into your exchange account, the position size will automatically adjust to the increased seed money from the next entry.
qna.funds_q2: Can I withdraw profits at any time?
qna.funds_a2: Yes, you can withdraw from the exchange whenever the bot is not holding a position.
qna.funds_q3: Is it possible with coins other than USDT?
qna.funds_a3: Currently, Quanty operates based on the USDT Futures market.
qna.data_q1: I want to know the Privacy Policy.
qna.data_a1: You can check the details in the 'Privacy Policy' link in the footer.
